laazotea.indi.driver

Class INDINumberElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • laazotea.indi.driver.INDIElement
      • laazotea.indi.driver.INDINumberElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class INDINumberElement
extends INDIElement
    A class representing a INDI Number Element.
    Version:
    1.34, November 8, 2013
    Author:
    S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjioi at ugr.es]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • INDINumberElement

        public INDINumberElement(INDINumberProperty property,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String label,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 java.lang.String minimum,
                 java.lang.String maximum,
                 java.lang.String step,
                 java.lang.String numberFormat)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an instance of a INDINumberElement with a name, a label, a initial value, a minimum, a maximum, a step and a numberFormat.
        Parameters:
        property - The Property to which this Element belongs.
        name - The name of the Element.
        label - The label of the Element.
        value - The initial value of the Element.
        minimum - The minimum of the Element.
        maximum - The maximum of the Element.
        step - The step of the Element.
        numberFormat - The number format of the element.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the value, minimum, maximum or step are not well formatted or if the initial Value is not in [minimum, maximum].

      • INDINumberElement

        public INDINumberElement(INDINumberProperty property,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String value,
                 java.lang.String minimum,
                 java.lang.String maximum,
                 java.lang.String step,
                 java.lang.String numberFormat)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an instance of a INDINumberElement with a name, a initial value, a minimum, a maximum, a step and a numberFormat. The label of the Element will be a copy of the name.
        Parameters:
        property - The Property to which this Element belongs.
        name - The name of the Element.
        value - The initial value of the Element.
        minimum - The minimum of the Element.
        maximum - The maximum of the Element.
        step - The step of the Element.
        numberFormat - The number format of the element.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the value, minimum, maximum or step are not well formatted or if the initial Value is not in [minimum, maximum].

                 java.lang.String name,
                 double value,
                 double minimum,

                 double step,
                 java.lang.String numberFormat)
                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs an instance of a INDINumberElement with a name, a initial value, a minimum, a maximum, a step and a numberFormat. The label of the Element will be a copy of the name.

        maximum - The maximum of the Element.
        step - The step of the Element.
        numberFormat - The number format of the element.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the initial Value is not in [minimum, maximum].
